channel.title: Families Like Ours

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: David Hockney
channel.desc: Documentary capturing the return from California of England's favourite living artist. As Hockney approaches the age of 70, he re-invents his painting from scratch.

channel.desc: An intimate documentary profile of artist David Hockney as he returns to the theme of double portraits, three decades after his iconic Mr and Mrs Clark and Percy. From 2003.
